The film follows the story of two young men who are members of the RAF. They are involved in a series of violent attacks against various targets including government buildings, banks, shopping centers, theaters, museums, schools, libraries, homes, businesses, people, animals, etc. during various times periods and locations in Germany.

Based on the user's preferences, I recommend two movies: "The Last Airbender" (2010) and "The Skulls" (2000).

"The Last Airbender" is an animated adventure film directed by Brian Gibson. The movie follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements - water, earth, fire and air - and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

"The Skulls" is an American action thriller film directed by William Petersen. The movie follows the adventures of six young men from elite colleges in the United States who are recruited to form a secret society called The Skulls.
